order
2   1

knot vector length
8   4

number of control points
5   2

knot vector
0.000000000000000000000e+00   0.000000000000000000000e+00   0.000000000000000000000e+00   5.000000000000000000000e-01   5.000000000000000000000e-01   1.000000000000000000000e+00   1.000000000000000000000e+00   1.000000000000000000000e+00

control points for python format
patchX = np.array(
   [[ 0.000000000000000000000e+00,   0.000000000000000000000e+00,   1.000000000000000000000e+00 ],
    [ 2.500000000000000000000e+00,   0.000000000000000000000e+00,   1.000000000000000000000e+00 ],
    [ 5.000000000000000000000e+00,   0.000000000000000000000e+00,   1.000000000000000000000e+00 ],
    [ 7.500000000000000000000e+00,   0.000000000000000000000e+00,   1.500000000000000000000e+00 ],
    [ 1.000000000000000000000e+01,   0.000000000000000000000e+00,   2.000000000000000000000e+00 ],
    [ 0.000000000000000000000e+00,   5.000000000000000000000e+00,   1.000000000000000000000e+00 ],
    [ 2.500000000000000000000e+00,   5.000000000000000000000e+00,   1.000000000000000000000e+00 ],
    [ 5.000000000000000000000e+00,   5.000000000000000000000e+00,   1.000000000000000000000e+00 ],
    [ 7.500000000000000000000e+00,   5.000000000000000000000e+00,   1.000000000000000000000e+00 ],
